    • saveChartAsPDF

      public static void saveChartAsPDF​(File file, org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart chart, int width, int height) throws IOException
      Write a chart to an file stream in PDF format.
      Parameters:
      file - The file to write to.
      chart - The chart to write.
      width - The width.
      height - The height.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown if the file could not be written.
